wikipedia_page.main: Neil Anthony Riddell (born 16 July 1947) is a former English cricketer. Riddell was a left-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace. He was born at Staindrop, County Durham.

response: * Neil Riddell, former captain of Durham County Cricket Club.Celebrations for school; Hundreds turn out for 125th anniversary. – Free Online Library
